subject: Attention dear beneficiary
body:
Attn; Beneficiary.

Happy new year 2024 to you.

I am Christine Moore the chairman and chief executive officer of
South Manchester credit union bank,
With reference to your entitlement fund and inline with the CHANGE OF
BENEFICARY'S APPLICATION,
signed by Mrs. Glenda F. Ward with your purported authorization. This
issue has been carefully examined
and we have declined Mrs. Ward's application as the application lacks
regular signature.
But Did you ever instruct Mrs Glenda F. Ward to claim your fund worth
US$20 Million Dollars as your new next of kin?
Below is the bank account information provided by Mrs Glenda F. Ward
saying that you authorized her as your new next of kin to claim your
fund because you are terminally ill.

Bank of America

Benf: Glenda F. Ward

ACCT: 586025513245

Routing: 111000025

Bank Address 9711 Bissonnet St. Houston, Tx 77036

if you had not authorized the change of your bank account in respect
to your outstanding entitlement Payment,
therefore notify me immediately as the notification / declaration was
supported with a sworn affidavit from New york high court ref: ilk
/jj/202/k2024, dated 5th January  2024 and signed by Mrs. Glenda Ward
who claim and stated in the sworn
declaration that you authorized her to claim the said fund on your
behalf to a different bank account in the U.S.A
as stated above because you were terminally ill and the Doctor who is
incharge of your case stated that you will
not stay more than one Month before passing away.

This development has caused lots of discrepancies in your payment file
that is why we had to suspend your payment and prompted to contact you
directly before re-validating your payment. You can be
rest assured that I will do everything within my capacity to successfully
actualize the quick transfer of your fund
to any of your nominated bank account.

Kindly get back to me as soon as possible so that I will direct you on
what to do,
noted we rejected the transfer charge fee of $4000 from her until we
hear from you.

This is the Contact E-mail Address of the (Dr Frank K. Jackmon ) He is
in charge of the fund transfer.

Contact E-mail: (fmoffinanceoffice@gmail.com)
Contact Person:  Dr Frank K. Jackmon

kindly forward your full banking details below to him.

Full name:.............................

Bank name:..........................

Bank address:......................

Cell phone number.............

Home address:....................

Routing No:........................

swift code...........................

Sincerely Yours

Christine Moore,
the chairman and
chief executive officer of south Manchester credit union bank

subject: Re: Attention dear beneficiary
body:
Hello Christine Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you had a wonderful New Year as well. I must say, your email has caught my attention. It seems there is some confusion regarding my funds and a certain Mrs. Glenda F. Ward.

To clarify, I have never instructed Mrs. Ward to claim any funds on my behalf or authorize any changes to my bank account. This is the first time I am hearing about this situation, and it is quite concerning.

Could you please provide more information about the alleged fund transfer and why Mrs. Ward claims to have authorization from me? I would like to understand the details before taking any further action.

Additionally, could you explain why my payment was suspended and what steps need to be taken to resolve this matter? I want to ensure that everything is handled correctly and efficiently.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention dear beneficiary
body:
You mean you don't know Mrs Glenda?I don't know the reason she want to
claim your fund,I can see that she an imposter and she must be arrested for
questioning.you payment was suspended because you haven't been serious on
claiming it.and again you haven't paid the required fee which for the
delivery and tax clearance of your fund,the fee $4000 USD.once you make the
payment your fund will be release to you with immediate effect.
Regards,
Mr.Christine Moore

body:

receive your fund kindly let me know.i won't email you again if you don't

body:

subject: Re: Attention dear beneficiary
body:
I wrote you before that Mrs ward approached office claiming that you are
seriously sick that she is your next of kin,but unfortunately we declined
her request and decided to contact you, which we did and you made us to
know that you don't know her.now we have made every necessary arrangements
for the immediate release of your fund which is a compensation fund by the
IMF.like I stated in my previous email,you are required to pay a total sum
of $4000 for the tax clearance and release order fee of your fund.i want
you to once that once you have made this payment your fund will be release
to you without further delay.

Sincerely,
Mr.Christine Moore

So if you can pay it today let me send you our cashier bank information
